events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection on March 30th.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description provided by the customer.
An agent was assigned to the case to begin processing the vehicle collision claim.
Formal acknowledgment sent to the policyholder confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and witness statements from the claimant.
Received all requested documents including the police report and damage assessment photos.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision commenced by the claims adjuster.
The investigation was concluded with confirmation that the claimant was not at fault in the accident.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the claimant.
The claimant responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim.
Approval granted for settlement payout and vehicle repair based on investigation findings.
Payment was issued promptly to the repair shop and rental car company as per the approved settlement.
The auto accident claim was closed after full settlement and customer confirmation of repair completion.
The finalized claim documentation was archived in the company system for future reference.
